fields.headline: One-day squad and itinerary
fields.bodyText: Nasser Hussain (Essex, capt) Age: 33 One-day internationals: 54 Andrew Caddick (Somerset) Age: 33 ODI: 36 Paul Collingwood (Durham) Age: 25 ODI: 7 Andrew Flintoff (Lancashire) Age: 24 ODI: 28 James Foster (Essex) Age: 21 ODI: 5 Ashley Giles (Warks) Age: 28 ODI: 9 Darren Gough (Yorkshire) Age: 31 ODI: 95 Matthew Hoggard (Yorkshire) Age: 25 ODI: 5 Ben Hollioake (Surrey) Age: 24 ODI: 17 Nick Knight (Warwickshire) Age: 32 ODI: 65 Owais Shah (Middlesex) Age: 23 ODI: 6 Jeremy Snape (Gloucs) Age: 28 ODI: 4 Graham Thorpe (Surrey) Age: 32 ODI: 72 Marcus Trescothick (Som) Age: 26 ODI: 26 Michael Vaughan (Yorkshire) Age: 27 ODI: 6 Craig White (Yorkshire) Age: 32 ODI: 39 Tour of India and N Zealand January Yesterday: Flew out Today: Arrive in India Thu 17: v Bengal (Calcutta) Sat 19: ODI (Calcutta, d/n) Tue 22: ODI (Cuttack) Fri 25: ODI (Madras, d/n) Mon 28: ODI (Kanpur) Thu 31: ODI (Kanpur) February Sun 3: ODI (Bombay, d/n) Mon 4: Depart for New Zealand Tue 5: Arrive in Auckland Fri 8: v N Districts (Hamilton, d/n) Sun 10: v N Districts (Hamilton) Wed 13: ODI (Christchurch, d/n) Sat 16: ODI (Wellington, d/n) Wed 20: ODI (Napier, d/n) Sat 23: ODI (Auckland, d/n) Tue 26: ODI (Dunedin, d/n) March Sat 2-4: v Otago (Queenstown) Thu 7-9: v Canterbury (Christchurch) Wed 13-17: First Test (Jade stadium, Christchurch) Thu 21-25: Second Test (Basin Reserve, Wellington) Sat 30-Apr 3: Third Test (Eden Park, Auckland)
